runs.comm: not a great start by the bowler as he pushes this down the leg side .. It keeps going away from the keeper.
length delivery, comes in with the angle from wide of the crease, Smith punches it to mid on
this one is through the gap at midwicket! Nothing wrong about the delivery, but Smith stays back and pulls the back of length delivery with ease
on the pads again an it's easily tucked to deep square leg for a single
a good delivery on off stump, it stays a touch low too. Gayle is lucky to get a thick inside edge on to this one.
stays in the crease and defends the back of length delivery towards cover
another wide.. this is not a good start from Mortaza as he slips this one down the leg side
calmly comes to the front foot and pushes the length delivery to mid off
big inswing and bigger appeal from the bowler! But this one was swinging too much and would have missed the leg by a lot. Smith plays all around it and gets hit on the knee roll
back of length delivery, it's nudged to mid-on and the fielder - Ziaur - targets the striker's end as Gayle slowly jogs in to make his ground
length delivery on the pads, Gayle seems to be content to dab the ball here and there.. he tucks this one to midwicket for a single
short and wide, the batsman throws his bat at that, but this doesn't bounce much and passes to the keeper under the bat
stays in the crease and clips the back of length delivery to deep square leg for a single
fuller length on off, still the giant showing only the gentle side.. pushes calmly to mid off
this one cuts Smith in half! He seems to be playing the same kind of loose cricket as in the first game.. It misses the inside edge and misses the off stump too
not in control of this one but he manages to beat the mid-on fielder with a front-foot chip shot.. He wanted it go further, but was just a meter over Tamim at mid on
now this time he plays a neat back foot punch to deep backward point for a couple. He stayed in the crease and allowed the ball to come to him, before opening the face
gets solidly behind this length delivery and pushes it down the pitch
goes on the back foot and punches the back of length delivery to deep midwicket for an easy single
he is beaten outside off as he tries to steer this angled delivery down to third man. He has been often out playing that nothing poke
tossed up and slightly veering towards the pads, Smith plays a no-nonsense sweep that rockets to the deep backward square leg boundary.. thundering shot
tossed up, another powerful sweep, the ball heads to the boundary in the same area. This is immediate pressure for Gazi..
flatter this time, and turns into the pads.. the batsman defends it to midwicket
this stayed a touch low and the batsman is lucky to get some bat on it
spinning down the leg side, the batsman clips it to deep backward square leg for a single
flighted and full outside off, Gayle lazily moves forward and pushes it to long off for an easy single
back of length delivery on off, it's easily dabbed to point for a quick single.. Doesn't look like making any effort in his running, but he makes it across with ease
tight bowling on the off and middle stump, Smith allows the ball to come in and nudges it to deep square leg for a single
comes forward and punches the rising delivery towards cover point
first sign of intent! He makes room by moving away to the leg side but plays a soft little punch to mid-off for a quick single
back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to point

he is beaten by the slower ball completely! Looks to hoick the length delivery to the leg side, but it stays a touch low and strikes him on the pads.. Mashrafe asks a question but that would have just gone over
tossed up and very slow from Gazi, 80 kph, Gayle comes forward and defends
slower still, the batsman comes down the pitch, but the ball arrives late. .He pads it to the leg side
another good ball, Gayle wants to come out, but he is being kept in leash with these slower ones
full and flighted outside off, Gayle has to lean forward and he pushes this to deep extra cover for a single
what is a good line for Gayle is perfect for sweeping for Smith.. And he does that, sweeps this flighted delivery on the pads to deep square leg
flighted on a length, Gayle comes forward to push it to long off, but gets an inside edge towards midwicket
length delivery outside off, Smith punches this firmly through cover, but now we have fielders in the deep
he comes down the pitch early and gets an inside edge to short fine leg as he looks to flat-bat this down the ground.. Smith calls for a quick single

Whoaa! This is as flat as you can imagine! It's only marginally short and it's hit straight to the deep square leg fielder. The ball didn't really go more than four meters above the ground, but never really came down..
comes forward and punches this one straight to short cover
looks to push it through off but almost chops it on to his stumps. No feet movement from Smith there
solid defense from Smith as he gets behind the line of the ball and punches it back to the bowler
full and flighted on the middle, he takes it on the full and pushes it to midwicket
this could have been close! He came down the pitch and played across the line.. gets hit on the pads..
another spooky moment for Gayle, he plays it in the air almost to the midwicket fielder
a release ball from Gazi, he slips this down the leg side and Gayle flicks it fine.. Not helped by the fielder who allows it to slip between his legs
here it comes! full and in the Gayle's arc. He took a step down the pitch and massacres it over long on for a huge one
now he goes back and punches it to long off to keep the strike
length delivery wide outside off, Gayle brings the bat down on it and cuts it straight to deep cover
he comes forward and gently chips it towards long-on.. I have a feeling that he played that too early, luckily for him it drops well short of long on
he opens the stance completely! This is the Cobra taking his S-shape for attack.. But misses this one as it goes across him..
he comes forward and punches the length delivery down to long off for a single
fuller delivery, loud appeal for lbw as the batsman misses his flick on the slower one, this one is slipping down the leg though
where was the fielder aiming! Smith dabbed it to midwicket, called for a sharp single, but the fielder fires a wild throw at Gayle's end.. All's well for WI
reverse sweep and a good one too! Picks it up from the leg stump line and gets enough bat on it to power it to deep point boundary
but now the deep midwicket boundary is peppered! It was a flatter, shorter delivery on off, the batsman waits for an extra second before thrashing it through midwicket
too full now, make it a hat-trick for smith.. he crunches this one down the ground.. all along the turf .. Too much power
on the pads, make it four in four! Gazi's fourth is falling apart.. Smith has reached his fifty here too. It's full on the pads and Smith cracks it with a powerful sweep. no one moves
oh this could have gone too! But he reverse paddles it straight to short third man
another strong sweep, this time it's hit to the fielder at deep backward square leg for a single
flatter and quicker on the stumps, the batsman punches it to the left of the bowler
this is short and this has disappeared! Smith is using the power handle to good affect. Just goes back a touch and easily clears the boundary at deep midwicket
flatter and quicker, the batsman defends it off the back foot
this is poor bowling! It's flighted and going down the leg side, Smith just helps it along and beats the short fine leg easily.. he has been sweeping so well, so that's not the line to bowl
allows this one to spin away, then crunches it to deep cover for a single
he comes round the wicket and bowls a flatter delivery, the batsman easily pushes it to long on for a single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
comes down the pitch and punches the shorter delivery down the ground to long off.. That turned away a lot
the last thing you need now is poor fielding! This is a rank bad effort from Gazi.. That was swept to deep square leg where Gazi charged the ball and allows it slip through his hands
this one is top-edged over midwicket for a six! He goes for a pull off a slow slow delivery and almost drags it.. but gets the distance

this one is a proper tog-edge now! Smith was looking to send this over square leg, but was not to the pitch of the delivery. He hoicks across the line and gets a huge top edge that is taken by the short fine leg fielder.
tossed up delivery, Gayle is in no mood to throw his wicket today. He is not bothered about singles too. Defends this

a wicket first ball, he is stumped with one fired down the leg side! What an impact this guy has on Bangladesh.. He saw the batsman moving out and pushed it down the leg.. Poor judgment from Simmons who didn't realise the ball was in Mushy's hands and kept moving forward..He was well inside the crease and just didn't see where the ball was. No bat, no pad on that.. it was a good solid wide
he gets off the strike with a clip to deep square leg
full on the pads, it's easily flicked down the leg side for a couple
this is flighted and almost a yorker, it's punched to long on for a single
on the pads, the batsman punches it straight to midwicket
he allows this to come to him, then cuts it straight to short third man
comes forward and pushes this one to cover
takes a step down and punches the short of length delivery to wide long on for a single
he goes on the back foot and runs this down past short third man for a couple of runs
goes on the back foot and punches this through cover.. Whoa, that runs away to the boundary.. Huge gap in the field there
tossed up and on the pads, the batsman plays it to deep midwicket with the turn, picks up an easy single
he is still not managing to hit them hard! It's shorter delivery and he flat bat it past the non-striker, but more of a toe-end to it
shorter delivery, pulled down to deep backward square leg for a single
flatter delivery on off, the batsman dabs it to cover for a quick single
no timing again! it's a full toss, in Gayle's zone and he hits it off the toe off his bat to long on..
he comes down the pitch and punches the flatter delivery to long on for a single
a good one from Shakib! in the blockhole and Gayle can only dig it out to long on
full and wide, another good delivery! Samuels stretches out and blocks it to off
pushed quicker wide outside off and the batsman misses the intended drive.. Excellent over from Shakib
he misses his flick again and is hit on the pads! Loud appeal for lbw, but that would have probably gone down leg from the angle from round the stumps..
he comes down the pitch and drives this one forcefully to long on
this is tragedy for Gayle fans! He flat bats this back to the bowler. In other times, those used to land in Dhaka city
comes down the pitch and misses the slog again, hits the pads..
no timing again! Oh no, what are you doing Bangladesh! This is hit down to long on, straight to Bijoy, who lets it go through his hands..poor poor effort
comes down the pitch and dabs it to midwicket for a single
looks to hit down the ground but gets an inside edge on to his boots.. A single to the off side
full and wide, outside the marker, was actually a good ball till Mushfiqur allows it to go between his legs! Bangladesh have given away too many of these

another one through Mushfiqur's legs! this is horrible stuff! They have everything in control, but they are giving away free runs. It was full toss outside off, the batsman misses his drive and the keeper keeps his legs spread apart
punched to long off for an easy single
full on off, he still doesn't get his timing, but this is straight enough to beat the fielders in the deep. Gets a boundary after an age
ok this is what you don't bowl when a batsman is stuggling! A juicy full toss from Shakib, this is hammered over long on..that six was bigger than any of Smith's hits today. 92 m
full and wide, the batsman squeezes it out to deep cover
good yorker on off, Gayle digs it out straight to extra cover
another good yorker. Gayle gets some space to get under it and cracks it straight to long off for a single
he stands in the crease and looks to punch this through off, but gets an inside edge past his stumps
good delivery, a low full toss on off, but that is all Gayle needs to whack it over the umpire's head for a boundary..
length delivery, he swings across the line and drags it to deep midwicket for a single

well judged by Tamim at long off! This is a good take. On another day, this would have sailed into the stands, but Gayle gets under it and hits it as far as the boundary. Tamim takes an overhead catch, then realises the momentum is taking him over the rope, so lobs the ball up, goes out, comes back, and completes the catch. End of a painful innings from Gayle

this could have been a run out! The batsman pushed the full ball straight to short third man and called for a single. He was going to be well short, but the bowler, who was not close to the stumps, misses it at close range.. What more, he has overstepped too
it's a good ball now, full and wide outside off and Samuels misses his inside out drive
full and wide outside off, the batsman squeezes it to short third man where a misfield allows for a single

another poor effort by the fielder! It's Mahmudullah, who waits for this lofted drive at long-off - it's an overhead effort - and it goes through his hand .. Sub-standard fielding this.. It drops inside the boundary..

another drop by Mahmudullah at long-off! What's going on.. this was a difficult chance though. Sammy drives this inside out towards wide long off, but the fielder got both hands to it.. Pushes it to the boundary to rub salt on his own wounds
short ball, gets the top edge, but this one sails over the keeper's head.. This is cruel for Ziaur..He has bowled a good over, but he has been hit for three boundaries

the catch is taken! Gazi at extra cover makes up for Mahmudullah's mistakes by taking a simple chance. It was a touch slower outside off and Samuels, who struggled today too, punches it straight to the fielder
another one goes down! Russell throws his bat at this slower one and sends this miles high towards long off, where Shakib - who is no Mahmudullah - settles under it and makes sure he gobbles it up...
he swings and misses.. A wonderful legcutted that beats the outside edge as Sammy swings his bat

whoaa Tamim! this is a stunner at short third man! Bravo looks to drive this through extra cover, gets a thick outside edge and Tamim - he flies to his right and plucks this from thin air. What a catch that one - great one-hander -- it was high too! What a contrasting day. Bravo falls for a first-baller again.
excellent over till now! This one is a nice legcutter that beats the bat

another chance! Another drop! The batsman gets a thick outside edge and Ziaur at point is no Tamim - he tries to leap for an over head chance, but is not able to complete that.. Still a good effort. What more, they pick up a bonus wicket as the batsmen look for a non-existent third.
